decisions.label: Check if Skip Logging Daily Stats

Flow.description: Adding new functionality: prefill weekly daily data

formulas.name: f_Week_Number
formulas.expression: IF( CEILING( ({!$Flow.CurrentDate}- DATE( YEAR({!$Flow.CurrentDate}), 1, 1) + 1) / 7) > 52, 52, CEILING( ({!$Flow.CurrentDate}- DATE( YEAR({!$Flow.CurrentDate}), 1, 1) + 1) / 7) )
